title: Ticket #2764: IPv6 sock_peer_to_string fails to return buf
description:
It looks like sock_peer_to_string (/src/condor_utils/internet.cpp around line 245) used to return buf if the getpeername succeeded, and unknown on failure. It now always returns unknown.

  1. Verify old behavior (probably check V7_7_3?)
  2. Why isn't anything broken? (Since buf is passed in as an argument, no one may be checking the return code.)
  3. Fix it.
check_ins: 2014-Jan-31 14:11   Check-in [39283]: (#2764) Fix sock_peer_to_string() to return formatted sinful string when known. (By Jaime Frey )
